monologue.text: It's been 2 weeks since the night Donna joined the band.
Every waking moment since then has been spent practicing, pushing each other to be better, to become the band we always knew we could be.
You return home after another long night of practice, exhaustion and pride mixing as you step into your room.
The journal rests next to your lamp, its pages waiting for another entry.
*I can't believe how far we've come.*
*They've all taught me something I'll never forget.*
